post.title: Photo Story 3
post.content: Since I’m at OOPSLA, I’m behind on my blog reading. But in case someone else hasn’t already blogged it, go check out Photo Story 3. I’ve got an an 20 month old, over 2000 pictures taken this year and a pile of relatives who are clamoring regularly for pictures so I’m pretty excited about this.
